name: Ticket to Ride® The Board Game

editorialNotes.standard: Cool reaction emoji! Strategy-smashing Nope cards! The fur truly flies in this slick adaptation of the zany card game.
Form smart alliances to keep the spice flowing in this superb digital re-imagining of the popular board game.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Switch on the laser pointer! Scoop the litter! Rub the belly of the all-seeing Pig-a-Corn! This mobile version of the insanely irreverent card game brings the fatal felines to our devices, along with a few purr-fect new twists. The hysterical illustrations by Matthew Inman (creator of The Oatmeal) spring to life with animation and sound—and a meter that tracks the chance of drawing an exploding kitten makes the game even more hilariously tense. Played face-to-face with friends or online against strangers, it’s surprisingly strategic and cat-astrophically fun.

ios.subtitle: A dice roller on your wrist.

editorialNotes.short: A dice roller on your wrist
editorialNotes.tagline: A dice roller on your wrist

editorialNotes.standard: What’s made OLO game one of our longtime multiplayer favourites? The way it perfectly captures the friendly fun of real-world shuffleboard and air hockey. Virtually anyone can jump into a match (locally or online) and have an amazing time flicking discs into the target zone for points—and slyly knocking an opponent’s discs away to lower their score. Elegant and irresistible, Sennep’s all-ages masterpiece lets up to four players enjoy games that can be as casual or hardcore as everyone wants them to be.
Scurry to victory with mountains of cheese by stealing from friends and evading the mousetrap in this lively digital re-imagining of the popular board game.
